posts.title: Aladdin
posts.preview: A thief in Agrabah falls in love with the daughter of the Sultan, Princess Jasmine
posts.cast: Scott Weinger - Aladdin, Robin Williams - Genie

posts.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
posts.preview: A beautiful girl takes refuge in a house in the forest with dwarves
posts.cast: Adrianna Caselotti - Snow White, Harry Stockwell - Prince

posts.title: Big Hero 6
posts.preview: A robotics prodigy has a close companion of a robot named Baymax
posts.cast: Ryan Potter - Hiro, Maya Rudolph-Aunt Cass

posts.title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
posts.preview: A dalmatian named Pongo meets Perdita and falls in love. Later on, she gives birth to puppies who end up being kidnapped by Cruella De Vil
posts.cast: Rod Taylor - Pongo, Betty Lou Gerson-Cruella De Vil

posts.title: The Aristocats
posts.preview: Duchess and her three cat children are kidnapped by a greedy butler, Edgar
posts.cast: Phil Harris - Thomas O' Malley, Eva Gabor - Duchess
